subject: Security Alert: Suspicious Login Attempt
body: Our systems have detected a suspicious login attempt on your account from an unrecognized device in an unusual location. For your security, we have temporarily locked your account to prevent any unauthorized access. This is a precautionary measure to protect your financial information. To restore access to your account, please follow the instructions to verify your identity. You will be prompted to answer a few security questions and reset your password. If you believe this alert is an error or if you have any questions, please contact our fraud department immediately. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and thank you for your understanding.
